name: inplace
author: Saul Pwanson <vd@saul.pw>
description: show values live while editing for addcol commands

name: vddedupe
author: Jeremy Singer-Vine @jsvine
description: adds commands for selection and removal of rows which are duplicates of prior rows

name: vdnormcol
author: Jeremy Singer-Vine @jsvine
description: normalises column names in any given sheet so that the names are unique, valid Python identifiers, and only composed of lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores

name: vdfec
author: Jeremy Singer-Vine @jsvine
description: loader for .fec files from the Federal Election Commission
